name: Porcupine's Fate (Demo v0.2)
description:
A horror shooter game set in the near future. Porcupine robots have run amuck and went on a killing spree! As Agent Tockie, you must take them out, search for survivors and recover the neuropath code. But this game is not an just ordinary game about just machines taking over...

Tutorial: F flashlight

WASD Move

SPACE jump

E interact

Move mouse to look around

1,2,3 keys to switch between different weapons.

Note: The last floor in this game is not finished yet.

NOTE: Save and load not done yet.
